mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recommend(recommendNum, sortNum, num, placeName, content, tel, addr, lat, lon) VALUES(#{recommendNum}, 1, #{num}, #{placeName}, #{content}, #{tel}, #{addr}, #{lat}, #{lon})
INSERT INTO recommendPic(recommendPicNum, imageFileName, recommendNum) VALUES(recommendPic_seq.NEXTVAL, #{imageFileName}, #{recommendNum})
mapper.select:
SELECT r.recommendNum, r.placeName, r.content, r.hitCount, rp.imageFileName FROM recommend r JOIN recommendPic rp ON r.recommendNum = rp.recommendNum
AND INSTR(rp.imageFileName,'main') > 0
ORDER BY r.recommendNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(count(*), 0) FROM recommend r JOIN recommendPic rp ON r.recommendNum = rp.recommendNum

SELECT r.recommendNum, r.placeName, r.content, r.hitCount, TO_CHAR(r.created, 'yyyy-mm-dd') created, rp.imageFileName FROM recommend r JOIN recommendPic rp ON r.recommendNum = rp.recommendNum WHERE r.recommendNum=#{recommendNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE recommend SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE recommendNum = #{recommendNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT recommendNum, placeName FROM recommend r
AND (recommendNum > #{recommendNum})
ORDER BY recommendNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT recommendNum, placeName FROM recommend r
AND (recommendNum < #{recommendNum})
ORDER BY recommendNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
